title: Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, Blonde Ash
descriptions:
Introducing the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash, the perfect desk for your home or professional office needs. 

This desk is designed with your convenience in mind. It features a spacious 59-inch width, providing ample space for all your work essentials. The desk is made of medium-density fiberboard with a paper laminate finish, ensuring durability and a sleek look. The Blonde Ash color adds a touch of elegance to any workspace.

With a total of four drawers, including a convenient slide-out keyboard tray, a file drawer, and three box drawers, you'll have plenty of storage options to keep your workspace organized. Plus, the desk is scratch-resistant and water spill-resistant, so you don't have to worry about accidental damage.

Assembly is required, but don't worry, we've provided detailed instructions to make it as easy as possible. Please note that due to the weight and size of the desk, it may require more than one person to handle. 

Rest assured, this desk meets ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards, ensuring its quality and durability. Additionally, if you prefer not to assemble it yourself, we offer an in-home assembly service. Simply contact us at 866-388-4350 to schedule your assembly appointment.

Upgrade your office space with the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash. Get yours today and experience the perfect blend of style, functionality, and convenience.

Introducing the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash! This desk is designed to make your work or home office space more organized and efficient. 

With a width of 59 inches, this desk provides ample space for your computer, paperwork, and other office essentials. It is made of medium-density fiberboard, ensuring durability and stability. The desk is finished with a stylish paper laminate in the beautiful Blonde Ash color.

The Realspace® Magellan desk features a slide-out keyboard tray for easy access and comfort while typing. It also comes with four drawers, including a file drawer and three box drawers, providing plenty of storage options for your documents, supplies, and personal items.

This desk is suitable for both home and professional use, and its scratch-resistant and water-spill-resistant properties ensure long-lasting durability. It meets the ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards, guaranteeing high-quality and safe usage.

Please note that the assembly of this desk is required, but worry not! We provide clear instructions, and if needed, you can contact our in-home assembly service at 866-388-4350 for assistance.

Lastly, please take note that this product is heavy and oversized, so it may require more than one person to handle it. But don't let that discourage you from owning this fantastic desk that will transform your work or home office into a more organized and stylish space. Get your Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash today!
